languages.text: "Подумай о еретиках, что мы уничтожили. Ты не чувствуешь праведный гнев, зная, что другие нечестивцы уйдут от твоего правосудия?"
"Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"
languages.original_text: "Подумай о еретиках, что мы уничтожили. Ты не чувствуешь праведный гнев, зная, что другие нечестивцы уйдут от твоего правосудия?"

traits.locale_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"
"Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"
"Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"
"Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"
"Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}たちが滅ぼしてきた異端者たちのことを思い出せ。他の違反者たちが君の裁きを免れると知っても、正義の怒りを感じないのか？」
languages.original_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}たちが滅ぼしてきた異端者たちのことを思い出せ。他の違反者たちが君の裁きを免れると知っても、正義の怒りを感じないのか？」

languages.text: "Denkt an die Ketzer, die wir vernichtet haben. Spürt Ihr keinen rechtschaffenen Ärger aufgrund der Gewissheit, dass andere Sünder Eurer Gerechtigkeit entgehen werden?"
languages.original_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

traits.locale_text: "Denkt an die Ketzer, die wir vernichtet haben. Spürt Ihr keinen rechtschaffenen Ärger aufgrund der Gewissheit, dass andere Sünder Eurer Gerechtigkeit entgehen werden?"

languages.text: « Songez à tous les hérétiques que nous avons éliminés. Ne ressentez-vous pas une juste colère en pensant aux autres coupables qui ne seront jamais jugés ? »
languages.original_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

traits.locale_text: « Songez à tous les hérétiques que nous avons éliminés. Ne ressentez-vous pas une juste colère en pensant aux autres coupables qui ne seront jamais jugés ? »

languages.text: «Piense en los herejes que hemos aniquilado. ¿No le sobreviene un arrebato de furia virtuosa sabiendo que otros infractores podrían eludir su justicia?».
languages.original_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

traits.locale_text: «Piense en los herejes que hemos aniquilado. ¿No le sobreviene un arrebato de furia virtuosa sabiendo que otros infractores podrían eludir su justicia?».

languages.text: “想想我们消灭的那些异端分子吧。不过，依然还有那么多人逍遥法外，难道你感觉不到正义的怒火吗？”
languages.original_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

traits.locale_text: “想想我们消灭的那些异端分子吧。不过，依然还有那么多人逍遥法外，难道你感觉不到正义的怒火吗？”

languages.text: "Yok ettiğimiz kâfirleri düşün. Başka günahkârların, adaletinden kaçacak olduğunu düşününce haklı bir öfke duymuyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Think of the heretics we have destroyed. Do you not feel righteous anger knowing that other transgressors will escape your justice?"

traits.locale_text: Yok ettiğimiz kâfirleri düşün. Diğer günahkârların, adaletinden kaçacak olduğunu bilince haklı bir öfke duymuyor musun?"
